document_data.name: Luc Sunbright
document_data.mainbody: '''Luc Sunbright''' was a priest of [[Lathander]] and [[Amaunator]] in [[Daggerford]] around [[1485 DR]].
document_data.Activities:
Luc led the worship of Lathander at the [[Morninglow Tower]], due to old regional traditions, but he additionally had the temple cater to the followers of Amaunator as well.D&D R&D Team (2013). ''[[Ghosts of Dragonspear Castle]]''. ([[Wizards of the Coast]]), ''p. 137''. ISBN [[Special:BookSources/978-0786965311|978-0786965311]].

Luc additionally served as a teacher for adventuring clerics within the Daggerford region.
document_data.Appearance: Luc was a handsome man in his prime, with golden hair and a full beard. He was always seen dressed in gold-and-rose robes and wearing a fine golden circlet around his head.
document_data.Personality: Luc was a self-important and blustery individual. He was very conscious about class differences and always dismissed farmers and merchants from the tower if wealthier folk needed it.
